message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the deal you're offering, I'm looking to stay closer to $8000 for this purchase.  Let me know if that's something you're willing to work with.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand that you're looking to stay close to $8000, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8500. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my initial target. Would you be willing to come down to $8250? It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident this product will be a great addition to my needs.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to get as close to your target as possible, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $8400. I think this product is worth more than that, and I'm willing to make one more concession to meet you in the middle. I'm offering the product to you for $8375. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll really benefit from this deal. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
